channel.title: Staff item help

item.title: Staff item help
item.dc:creator: @God11 God11
item.description:
@God11 wrote:

okay i figured out how to make items only weildable by staff. how would i make it where if non staff tried wearing it, they would get banned?

this is my code

if (ItemID == 773 && playerRights <= 1) { PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName + " IS TRYING TO WEAR P RING BAN HIM!!"); return 1000; }

now how would i get it to where it bans cause they tried wearing it if they non staff?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 14, 2009, 10:57:22 am[/size][hr]bump any one hlep?

Read full topic
